definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: The image - dissector scanner is another heavily used and very successful low light level detector.
sentences.chinese: 析象管掃描器是另一種常用而且很成功的微光探測器。

sentences.english: You light the world is the most warm heart hurt.
sentences.chinese: 你是微光世界裏最溫暖的心傷。

sentences.english: Twenty-four years old birthday, is in a dim light went by.
sentences.chinese: 二十四歲的生日，是在一片朦朧微光中流逝。

sentences.english: At the same time, the LLL night vision device has also other active and passive interferences.
sentences.chinese: 同時，微光夜視還受到其它有源和無源干擾。

sentences.english: Is that the Ljiang River suffused with dim but glittering light?
sentences.chinese: 那遠處泛着微光，一閃一閃的是灕江嗎？

sentences.english: A little lantern blinked through the darkness .
sentences.chinese: 一盞小燈在黑暗中閃爍着微光。

sentences.english: With the development of night vision technology, it is applied more widely.
sentences.chinese: 隨着微光夜視技術的發展，其應用越來越廣泛。

sentences.english: A lantern or lamp having such a lens.
sentences.chinese: 一盞小燈在黑暗中閃爍着微光。

sentences.english: Oh, I know, That the music's fine. Like sparkling wine.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我知道，音樂很美妙，就像閃著微光的紅酒。

sentences.english: even though it is the holiday season. Just seeing little twinkling lights around
sentences.chinese: 即使是聖誕季。僅僅看着四周搖曳的微光，

sentences.english: With its glimmering tints of bronze, the building has a striking appearance.
sentences.chinese: 建築物有着顯眼的泛着微光的青銅色外立面。

sentences.english: Her topsails and flying kites had a faint glow upon them where the dawn caught them.
sentences.chinese: 上桅帆和迎風飄動的輕帆映着晨曦的微光。

sentences.english: The effect of image enhancement is outstanding in the application in low-level-light video image system.
sentences.chinese: 在微光視頻圖像系統中應用，使圖像增強效果明顯。

sentences.english: The lights of town glimmered in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 鎮上的燈火在遠處閃着微光。

sentences.english: For it is only in the actions of human beings that small glimmers of truth—or the soul—can ever be seen.
sentences.chinese: 只有在人類的行動中才能窺得真理和靈魂的絲絲微光。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
